name: voidspir_spawn_03
text: Long have my celestial brothers beckoned...
text_simple: long have my celestial brothers beckoned

name: voidspir_spawn_04
text: I am the void and the spirit.
text_simple: i am the void and the spirit

name: voidspir_spawn_06
text: I abhor the blindness of the mortal plane.
text_simple: i abhor the blindness of the mortal plane

name: voidspir_spawn_07
text: We will test ourselves in battle to prepare for the war to come.
text_simple: we will test ourselves in battle to prepare for the war to come

name: voidspir_spawn_08_02
text: I step again into the mortal plane.
text_simple: i step again into the mortal plane

name: voidspir_spawn_09
text: Your comprehension is not required. Only your cooperation.
text_simple: your comprehension is not required only your cooperation

name: voidspir_spawn_10_03
text: The passage of time on the mortal plane is immensely...tedious.
text_simple: the passage of time on the mortal plane is immensely tedious

name: voidspir_spawn_11
text: Existence as you perceive it is but a shade of the infinite realm.
text_simple: existence as you perceive it is but a shade of the infinite realm

name: voidspir_spawn_11_03
text: Existence as you perceive it is but a shade of the infinite realm.
text_simple: existence as you perceive it is but a shade of the infinite realm

name: voidspir_spawn_12
text: Before me, the map of all of time unfolds...
text_simple: before me the map of all of time unfolds

name: voidspir_spawn_13
text: It is time for the celestials to unite...or fall before me.
text_simple: it is time for the celestials to unite or fall before me

name: voidspir_spawn_14
text_simple: i sense distortions in the void
pretty_criteria: Spawning|A silver hero chat wheel was used

name: voidspir_spawn_15
text: This path leads amongst my brothers, where they have long wished I'd go.
text_simple: this path leads amongst my brothers where they have long wished id go

name: voidspir_spawn_16
text: I tip the balance of the cosmic scale.
text_simple: i tip the balance of the cosmic scale

name: voidspir_spawn_17_03
text: I step from my Hidden Temple.
text_simple: i step from my hidden temple

name: voidspir_spawn_18
text: Those who have served me will at last know my true face.
text_simple: those who have served me will at last know my true face

name: voidspir_spawn_19
text: My sight's horizon nears its end...
text_simple: my sights horizon nears its end

name: voidspir_spawn_20
text: I visit these lands sparingly, but to great effect.
text_simple: i visit these lands sparingly but to great effect

name: voidspir_spawn_21
text: Friend or foe, in the wake of the confluence, you will follow where I lead.
text_simple: friend or foe in the wake of the confluence you will follow where i lead

name: voidspir_spawn_22
text: I will not allow the Hidden Temple to fall.
text_simple: i will not allow the hidden temple to fall

name: voidspir_spawn_23
text: A dark energy... but not a dark intent.
text_simple: a dark energy but not a dark intent

name: voidspir_hero_intro_01
text: The great confluence approaches and my time finally comes.
text_simple: the great confluence approaches and my time finally comes

name: voidspir_hero_intro_02
text: Those who serve me seek wisdom, not reward.
text_simple: those who serve me seek wisdom not reward

name: voidspir_hero_intro_03
text: Always I will choose one. At times, I may choose many.
text_simple: always i will choose one at times i may choose many

name: voidspir_hero_intro_04
text: We must ready this plane to face the threats to come.
text_simple: we must ready this plane to face the threats to come

name: voidspir_hero_intro_05
text: There is no inherent meaning to your mortal lives. That, you must leave to those of us above.
text_simple: there is no inherent meaning to your mortal lives that you must leave to those of us above

name: voidspir_hero_intro_06
text: I suffer the indignities of the mortal plane only so long as I must.
text_simple: i suffer the indignities of the mortal plane only so long as i must

name: voidspir_hero_intro_07
text: My path leads where few can follow.
text_simple: my path leads where few can follow

name: voidspir_hero_intro_08
text: I arrive to avert the destruction that comes.
text_simple: i arrive to avert the destruction that comes

name: voidspir_battlebegins_01
text: A single mistep could undo aeons of planning. Even I must be careful.
text_simple: a single mistep could undo aeons of planning even i must be careful

name: voidspir_battlebegins_02
text: I was always watching. Now I lend a hand.
text_simple: i was always watching now i lend a hand
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: voidspir_battlebegins_03
text: Everything is in place. Only one task remains.
text_simple: everything is in place only one task remains

name: voidspir_battlebegins_04
text: Now I lay their plans to waste.
text_simple: now i lay their plans to waste

name: voidspir_battlebegins_05
text: Now my plans will lay their plans to waste.
text_simple: now my plans will lay their plans to waste

name: voidspir_firstblood_03
text: First blood. By an arbitrary definition.
text_simple: first blood by an arbitrary definition

name: voidspir_firstblood_04
text: First blood. Now to finish how it began.
text_simple: first blood now to finish how it began

name: voidspir_firstblood_05
text: First blood. The first celestial reigns.
text_simple: first blood the first celestial reigns

text: Do I choose this path or does it choose me?
text_simple: do i choose this path or does it choose me

name: voidspir_move_19
text: Do you think I've not seen this?
text_simple: do you think ive not seen this

text: There is no flight from me.
text_simple: there is no flight from me

text: I will always watch over me.

text: I must admit to enjoying that.

text: It isn't shadow that bathes me.

text: I do not like to be touched.

text: Anywhere you can go, I can be waiting.

text: This is why they call me the Hidden ONES.

text: The hidden path reveals your demise.

name: voidspir_levelup_01
text_simple: my diminishment in this realm lessens

name: voidspir_levelup_02
text: I must bring the full measure of my power into this realm.
text_simple: i must bring the full measure of my power into this realm

name: voidspir_levelup_05
text: Soon my powers may well be enough...
text_simple: soon my powers may well be enough

name: voidspir_levelup_06
text: None see the threat that looms.
text_simple: none see the threat that looms

name: voidspir_levelup_08
text: A brimful of aether will help my side.
text_simple: a brimful of aether will help my side

name: voidspir_levelup_09
text: Only I can draw upon the strength of the void.
text_simple: only i can draw upon the strength of the void

text: The power of the void breaks across the planes.
text_simple: the power of the void breaks across the planes

text: Hn hn ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haa.

name: voidspir_kill_01
text: Your time and place have come and gone.
text_simple: your time and place have come and gone

name: voidspir_kill_02
text: You were placed on my path for this reason.
text_simple: you were placed on my path for this reason

name: voidspir_kill_03
text: Each moment of your life led without doubt... to this.
text_simple: each moment of your life led without doubt to this

name: voidspir_kill_04
text: Your final gasp serves as bellows to the whirlwinds of destruction.
text_simple: your final gasp serves as bellows to the whirlwinds of destruction

name: voidspir_kill_06
text: Your fate line was unfortunate to touch my path.
text_simple: your fate line was unfortunate to touch my path

name: voidspir_kill_07
text: The entirety of your existence was but a single moment.
text_simple: the entirety of your existence was but a single moment

name: voidspir_kill_08
text: Rest well. Your death has consequence.
text_simple: rest well your death has consequence

name: voidspir_kill_11
text: Who cannot maintain will always fall.
text_simple: who cannot maintain will always fall

name: voidspir_kill_12
text: The void minds not your existence, for the void minds not.
text_simple: the void minds not your existence for the void minds not

name: voidspir_kill_13
text: Your life served no purpose, but your death may still.
text_simple: your life served no purpose but your death may still

name: voidspir_kill_14
text: I push the future ever further towards my own ends.
text_simple: i push the future ever further towards my own ends

name: voidspir_kill_15
text: Your life was a flash in the blink of my eye.
text_simple: your life was a flash in the blink of my eye

name: voidspir_kill_16
text: You sought to bargain something of little value.
text_simple: you sought to bargain something of little value

name: voidspir_kill_17
text: Why did you make an enemy of me? I had no reason to notice you...
text_simple: why did you make an enemy of me i had no reason to notice you

name: voidspir_kill_18
text: You could merely hope to amount even to nothing.
text_simple: you could merely hope to amount even to nothing

name: voidspir_kill_19
text: You cannot escape that which is all around you.
text_simple: you cannot escape that which is all around you

name: voidspir_kill_21
text: You haven't failed. This was your greatest success.
text_simple: you havent failed this was your greatest success

name: voidspir_death_02
text: This is ... the path I must walk.
text_simple: this is the path i must walk

name: voidspir_death_03
text: Ages of preparation... come to this...
text_simple: ages of preparation come to this

name: voidspir_death_06
text: I fear not ... the journey ahead.
text_simple: i fear not the journey ahead

name: voidspir_death_07
text_simple: you have played your part well

name: voidspir_death_08
text: True power ... attracts its own kind.
text_simple: true power attracts its own kind

name: voidspir_death_11
text: This couldn't have happened...in the void.
text_simple: this couldnt have happened in the void

name: voidspir_death_12
text: The meaning you ascribe to this...is false.
text_simple: the meaning you ascribe to this is false

name: voidspir_death_13
text: When next you turn around...I will be there.
text_simple: when next you turn around i will be there

name: voidspir_death_14
text: You cannot truly pierce the void...
text_simple: you cannot truly pierce the void

name: voidspir_death_15
text: You do not see the true danger...
text_simple: you do not see the true danger

name: voidspir_death_17
text_simple: this will open a dark path

name: voidspir_respawn_01
text: I step from the void's embrace.
text_simple: i step from the voids embrace

name: voidspir_respawn_02
text: There's nothing out there but the void.
text_simple: theres nothing out there but the void

name: voidspir_respawn_03
text: My work here is not yet done.
text_simple: my work here is not yet done

name: voidspir_respawn_04
text: Before there was something... there was nothing.
text_simple: before there was something there was nothing

name: voidspir_respawn_05
text: I must endure the indignities of the mortal coil...
text_simple: i must endure the indignities of the mortal coil

name: voidspir_respawn_07
text: Was this part of my plan, you ask? All that occurs is well accounted for.
text_simple: was this part of my plan you ask all that occurs is well accounted for

name: voidspir_respawn_08
text: I have reformed myself from the fabric of the void.
text_simple: i have reformed myself from the fabric of the void

name: voidspir_respawn_09
text: I stay true to the course.
text_simple: i stay true to the course

name: voidspir_respawn_10
text: The universe reminds me of my place.
text_simple: the universe reminds me of my place

name: voidspir_respawn_11
text: Perhaps I was hidden for too long...
text_simple: perhaps i was hidden for too long

name: voidspir_respawn_12
text: Even my plans are a just toss in the dark...
text_simple: even my plans are a just toss in the dark

name: voidspir_respawn_14
text: The enemy is more formidable than I'd thought.
text_simple: the enemy is more formidable than id thought

name: voidspir_respawn_15
text: This plane does not suit me, but the work is not yet done.
text_simple: this plane does not suit me but the work is not yet done

name: voidspir_lasthit_11
text: The best you could hope for.
text_simple: the best you could hope for

name: voidspir_lasthit_12
text: I take no pleasure in culling a lesser foe.
text_simple: i take no pleasure in culling a lesser foe

text: This one was not for you.
text_simple: this one was not for you

text: Did you think it was yours?
text_simple: did you think it was yours

name: voidspir_deny_18
text: I see a lot of nothing in your future.
text_simple: i see a lot of nothing in your future

text: What would you have me give?
text_simple: what would you have me give

name: voidspir_purch_05
text: Blood coin pays passage in this land.
text_simple: blood coin pays passage in this land

name: voidspir_scepter_02
text: If my enemies had hope before, none remains.
text_simple: if my enemies had hope before none remains

name: voidspir_scepter_03
text: I must admit, occasionally a mortal DOES create something of consequence...
text_simple: i must admit occasionally a mortal does create something of consequence

name: voidspir_item_04
text: It was wise to share this recipe.
text_simple: it was wise to share this recipe

name: voidspir_item_15
text: They will weep as the void takes them.
text_simple: they will weep as the void takes them

text: I could drink this all day.
text_simple: i could drink this all day

text: This is not the first time I've felt the heft of this blade.
text_simple: this is not the first time ive felt the heft of this blade

text: Only this can contain the void.
text_simple: only this can contain the void

name: voidspir_item_37
text: This will complement my skills nicely.
text_simple: this will complement my skills nicely

text: I always knew where to find you, Kaya. It simply wasn't time.
text_simple: i always knew where to find you kaya it simply wasnt time

text: The truth of sight is always welcome.
text_simple: the truth of sight is always welcome

text: This is a strange land, to be sure.
text_simple: this is a strange land to be sure

text: Hm! And mortals underestimate its power...
text_simple: hm and mortals underestimate its power

text: The path of this conflict was decided long ago.

name: voidspir_rival_01
text: You never understood--or even truly questioned--why you were given this power.
text_simple: you never understoodor even truly questionedwhy you were given this power

name: voidspir_rival_02
text: Nothing you could conjure in the material plane would have been enough to save you.
text_simple: nothing you could conjure in the material plane would have been enough to save you

name: voidspir_rival_03
text: I once thought you might aid my cause in a much greater capacity than fodder.
text_simple: i once thought you might aid my cause in a much greater capacity than fodder

name: voidspir_rival_04
text: The Turstarkuri were consumed by their own folly. They let themselves be slaughtered.
text_simple: the turstarkuri were consumed by their own folly they let themselves be slaughtered

name: voidspir_rival_05
text: Your masters misunderstood my teachings. But their folly ends with you.

name: voidspir_rival_09
text: If your greatest ambition was to ride a bat, you die not a failure.
text_simple: if your greatest ambition was to ride a bat you die not a failure

name: voidspir_rival_10
text: Is there a discernable difference between your kind and those you call beasts?
text_simple: is there a discernable difference between your kind and those you call beasts

name: voidspir_rival_11
text: You concern yourself only with gluttony. And this is where that path leads.
text_simple: you concern yourself only with gluttony and this is where that path leads

name: voidspir_rival_12
text: You see little of the path for one so concerned with tracks.
text_simple: you see little of the path for one so concerned with tracks

name: voidspir_rival_13
text: Your potential has been dulled to the point of nothingness.
text_simple: your potential has been dulled to the point of nothingness

name: voidspir_rival_14
text: Once you would have been a powerful ally...
text_simple: once you would have been a powerful ally

name: voidspir_rival_15
text: I was surprised you could even comprehend my existence.
text_simple: i was surprised you could even comprehend my existence

name: voidspir_rival_16
text: Destroyed by the webs you yourself wove.
text_simple: destroyed by the webs you yourself wove
pretty_criteria: Killing Broodmother at between 1 minute and 20 minutes in (25% chance)

name: voidspir_rival_17
text: A life of constant battle can only end like this.
text_simple: a life of constant battle can only end like this

name: voidspir_rival_18
text: Armageddon has lost a step or two...
text_simple: armageddon has lost a step or two

name: voidspir_rival_19
text: I expected this. I never thought to find an ally in one such as you.
text_simple: i expected this i never thought to find an ally in one such as you

name: voidspir_rival_20
text: You sought to control the world around you. Yet each choice led to here.
text_simple: you sought to control the world around you yet each choice led to here

name: voidspir_rival_21
text: Your curse is nothing to the void.
text_simple: your curse is nothing to the void

name: voidspir_rival_22
text: You donned the armor. You met your end.
text_simple: you donned the armor you met your end

name: voidspir_rival_23
text: For a mortal to possess such power is...quaint.
text_simple: for a mortal to possess such power is quaint

name: voidspir_rival_24
text: I could have shown you a way beyond the wall...
text_simple: i could have shown you a way beyond the wall

name: voidspir_rival_25
text: You come from a race of insects. Easily swatted.
text_simple: you come from a race of insects easily swatted

name: voidspir_rival_26
text: The powers of the Nothl realm are no secret to me.
text_simple: the powers of the nothl realm are no secret to me

name: voidspir_rival_27
text: You have wasted gifts untold, crone.
text_simple: you have wasted gifts untold crone

name: voidspir_rival_28
text: The elements cannot hope to rein me in.
text_simple: the elements cannot hope to rein me in
pretty_criteria: Killing Disruptor at between 1 minute and 20 minutes in (25% chance)

name: voidspir_rival_29
text: Mortals fear you. I do not.
text_simple: mortals fear you i do not

name: voidspir_rival_30
text: I honor the power of the elder inside you.
text_simple: i honor the power of the elder inside you

name: voidspir_rival_31
text: You find your true tribe amongst the dead.
text_simple: you find your true tribe amongst the dead

name: voidspir_rival_32
text: To deny my wisdom is to choose death.
text_simple: to deny my wisdom is to choose death

name: voidspir_rival_33
text: Tethered to this plane, you accomplish nothing.
text_simple: tethered to this plane you accomplish nothing

name: voidspir_rival_34
text: I could have been powerful friend to you, Earthshaker.
text_simple: i could have been powerful friend to you earthshaker

name: voidspir_rival_35
text: The creator falls like all the rest.
text_simple: the creator falls like all the rest

name: voidspir_rival_36
text: Did you think I was one of your creations?
text_simple: did you think i was one of your creations

name: voidspir_rival_37
text: I alone see the way forward.
text_simple: i alone see the way forward

name: voidspir_rival_38
text: What is a flame burning in the void?
text_simple: what is a flame burning in the void

name: voidspir_rival_39
text: Your actions endanger that which you swore to protect.
text_simple: your actions endanger that which you swore to protect

name: voidspir_rival_40
text: We could have accomplished much as allies, Enigma.
text_simple: we could have accomplished much as allies enigma

name: voidspir_rival_41
text: This will play havoc with the universe...
text_simple: this will play havoc with the universe

name: voidspir_rival_42
text: You understand the dangers that lie ahead and yet you stand against me?
text_simple: you understand the dangers that lie ahead and yet you stand against me

name: voidspir_rival_43
text: Sailing upon the ocean is not the same as swimming in the sea.
text_simple: sailing upon the ocean is not the same as swimming in the sea

name: voidspir_rival_44
text: A petulant pursuit for power meets its proper end.
text_simple: a petulant pursuit for power meets its proper end

name: voidspir_rival_45
text: Your inventions hardly lift you above the rabble.
text_simple: your inventions hardly lift you above the rabble

name: voidspir_rival_47
text: You cannot escape me, Io. Our paths are linked.
text_simple: you cannot escape me io our paths are linked

name: voidspir_rival_48
text: There would be no arcane arts without the void.
text_simple: there would be no arcane arts without the void

name: voidspir_rival_49
text: I had hoped the wisdom of your kind would help you choose a better path.
text_simple: i had hoped the wisdom of your kind would help you choose a better path

text_simple: from my perspective you met this fate only moments after the rest of your kind

text: It brings me no pleasure to extinguish the first light.
text_simple: it brings me no pleasure to extinguish the first light

text: The sea is a storm pond when compared to the void.
text_simple: the sea is a storm pond when compared to the void

name: voidspir_rival_53
text: A better death than at the hands of a demon.
text_simple: a better death than at the hands of a demon

name: voidspir_rival_54
text: What other end could one such as you meet?
text_simple: what other end could one such as you meet

name: voidspir_rival_55
text: You certainly were a presumptuous child.
text_simple: you certainly were a presumptuous child

name: voidspir_rival_56
text: Your tormented existence comes to a merciful end.
text_simple: your tormented existence comes to a merciful end

text: The soul of the slayer has been enveloped by the void.
text_simple: the soul of the slayer has been enveloped by the void

text: Your timeless history is a footnote in the scheme of the universe.
text_simple: your timeless history is a footnote in the scheme of the universe

text: You'd have wasted another span of years anyway.
text_simple: youd have wasted another span of years anyway

text: Noble creatures die the same as the wretched.
text_simple: noble creatures die the same as the wretched

text_simple: what does the word god mean to me pup

text_simple: there will be no justice for you

text: Your titles mean nothing to me.
text_simple: your titles mean nothing to me

text_simple: gods never fared well against you but i am not a god

text_simple: the goddess of luck always was a moron

text: This does not please me, youngling.
text_simple: this does not please me youngling

text_simple: without decay your life truly ends here

text: I warned you not to interrupt me.

text_simple: demons creatures of great power and limited intelligence

text: A great lineage comes to a nullifying end.
text_simple: a great lineage comes to a nullifying end

text: I don't waste my time with petty criminals.

text_simple: your singular focus blinds you to the real matters at hand

text_simple: your magics were surprisingly powerful but your case was hopeless all the same

text: You could serve my interests well, Nyx... Should you choose to do so.

name: voidspir_ally_40
text: I have not gleaned what comes beyond this battle, Oracle. Is your sight the same?

name: voidspir_ally_42
text: The high road may be lost to you Assassin, but there are other paths to follow...

text: Some of the first visitors to my temple were ancestors of yours.

name: voidspir_ally_44
text: None of it truly matters, Skywrath. Try to let it go.

text: Amusing that they call you an outlander...

text: We couldn't be more different, yet we're inextricably linked...

text: I warned you to follow my instructions to the letter...

name: voidspir_ally_48
text: I make no apologies for allowing Thunderkeg to stumble upon that foribidden spell.

name: voidspir_ally_49
text: Try to contain that wild streak for once and stick to the plan.

name: voidspir_ally_50
text: You have done well, child. Now your true service comes to pass.

name: voidspir_ally_51
text: You do not recognize me, Lanaya. But I am known to you all the same.

pretty_criteria: Templar Assassin is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in (30% chance)

name: voidspir_ally_52
text: In some ways, you're more alive than most mortals will ever be.
text_simple: in some ways youre more alive than most mortals will ever be

name: voidspir_ally_53
text: Zeus, I must say your attraction to mortals is...puzzling.

pretty_criteria: Zeus is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in (30% chance)

name: voidspir_whawiz_01
text: I have never encountered a wizard who didn't bore me.
text_simple: i have never encountered a wizard who didnt bore me

name: voidspir_wheel_laugh_01
text: He he he he he he.
text_simple: he he he he he he

name: voidspir_wheel_deny_01
text: There is nothing for you here. There is nothing for you anywhere.
text_simple: there is nothing for you here there is nothing for you anywhere

name: voidspir_wheel_deny_02
text: I must forgive you for being only what you are.
text_simple: i must forgive you for being only what you are

name: voidspir_wheel_deny_03_02
text: You seem to have trouble grasping cause and effect.
text_simple: you seem to have trouble grasping cause and effect

name: voidspir_wheel_all_01
text: You must learn to live with the void inside.
text_simple: you must learn to live with the void inside

name: voidspir_wheel_all_02
text: Surrender all hope to the void.
text_simple: surrender all hope to the void

name: voidspir_wheel_all_03
text: If you look long enough into the void...
text_simple: if you look long enough into the void

name: voidspir_wheel_all_04_02
text: Embrace the infinite possibilities of the void.
text_simple: embrace the infinite possibilities of the void

name: voidspir_wheel_all_05
text: Even a god is nothing set against the void.
text_simple: even a god is nothing set against the void
criteria: Kill Isvoid_spirit IsEnemyMars Chance_40%|Kill Isvoid_spirit IsEnemyZuus Chance_40%

name: voidspir_wheel_all_06
text: There is nothing outside the void.
text_simple: there is nothing outside the void

name: voidspir_wheel_all_08
text: Emotion is like any other tool -- easily mishandled.
text_simple: emotion is like any other tool easily mishandled

name: voidspir_wheel_all_09
text: The void is not absence. The void is omnipresence!
text_simple: the void is not absence the void is omnipresence

name: voidspir_wheel_all_10_02
text: How can you carry hope in the face of the void?
text_simple: how can you carry hope in the face of the void
pretty_criteria: A master hero chat wheel was used

name: voidspir_wheel_all_11_02
text: I will not harm those who do not stand in my way.
text_simple: i will not harm those who do not stand in my way

name: voidspir_wheel_all_12
text: The wisdom of eternity guides my blade.
text_simple: the wisdom of eternity guides my blade

name: voidspir_void_01
text: Before there was the spirit, there was the void. Before there was anything, there was the void.
text_simple: before there was the spirit there was the void before there was anything there was the void

name: voidspir_void_02_03
text: Long after -- though only a moment in the scope of the whole -- there came...a being of great power.
text_simple: long after though only a moment in the scope of the whole there came a being of great power

name: voidspir_void_03_03
text: Still without comprehensible form or voice of my own, I felt this titan's hammer fall and the four children scatter.
text_simple: still without comprehensible form or voice of my own i felt this titans hammer fall and the four children scatter

name: voidspir_void_04_03
text: I began to find myself in the reverberations of the blow. And I saw the expanse of time flash forth from the instant.
text_simple: i began to find myself in the reverberations of the blow and i saw the expanse of time flash forth from the instant

name: voidspir_void_05_03
text: In that cascade of moments, I knew I must learn to compose a form capable of interacting with the material plane.
text_simple: in that cascade of moments i knew i must learn to compose a form capable of interacting with the material plane

name: voidspir_battle_01_02
text: Those who see little think this battle to be the end of things.
text_simple: those who see little think this battle to be the end of things

name: voidspir_battle_02_02
text: For some, it may be. For others, the fall of an Ancient signals a fight of a different kind.
text_simple: for some it may be for others the fall of an ancient signals a fight of a different kind

name: voidspir_battle_03_02
text: I sense distortions in the void.
text_simple: i sense distortions in the void

name: voidspir_battle_04
text: Something comes. And none alone can stop it.
text_simple: something comes and none alone can stop it

name: voidspir_bastion_01_02
text: I have taken a form more able to interact with the matters of the mortal plane, but I do not pass my time here.
text_simple: i have taken a form more able to interact with the matters of the mortal plane but i do not pass my time here

name: voidspir_bastion_02_02
text: To house this body and the artifacts it collects, I long ago constructed a hidden bastion.
text_simple: to house this body and the artifacts it collects i long ago constructed a hidden bastion

name: voidspir_bastion_02_04
text: A temple fashioned after a Korumite design -- far removed from the reach of all but those very few I permit to chance across it.
text_simple: a temple fashioned after a korumite design far removed from the reach of all but those very few i permit to chance across it

name: voidspir_bidding_01_03
text: Many do my bidding, but none know my true face.
text_simple: many do my bidding but none know my true face

name: voidspir_bidding_02_02
text: Some amongst them are privy to a degree of wisdom, while others remain blind.
text_simple: some amongst them are privy to a degree of wisdom while others remain blind

name: voidspir_blind_01
text: I have seen everything just beyond this moment. But there soon comes a point where I am blind.
text_simple: i have seen everything just beyond this moment but there soon comes a point where i am blind

name: voidspir_blind_02
text: I do not worry. I have made every preparation for what I imagine lies ahead.
text_simple: i do not worry i have made every preparation for what i imagine lies ahead

name: voidspir_plane_01_03
text: I do not enjoy how it feels to walk the mortal plane, but mortals themselves can be quite amusing.
text_simple: i do not enjoy how it feels to walk the mortal plane but mortals themselves can be quite amusing

name: voidspir_plane_02
text: The decisions they make are nothing but astounding. But how can they choose otherwise? They cannot truly see.
text_simple: the decisions they make are nothing but astounding but how can they choose otherwise they cannot truly see

name: voidspir_plane_03_02
text: I do not stop their scurrying if I can help it. And if they get in my way...their deaths will not be unkind.
text_simple: i do not stop their scurrying if i can help it and if they get in my way their deaths will not be unkind

name: voidspir_koru_01_03
text: The Temple of the Korumite monks was filled with scholars wise enough to study both the martial and arcane arts, yet humble enough to know they did not possess the wisdom to correctly wield them.
text_simple: the temple of the korumite monks was filled with scholars wise enough to study both the martial and arcane arts yet humble enough to know they did not possess the wisdom to correctly wield them

name: voidspir_koru_02_02
text: Very few mortals since have earned my respect like the Korumite. That barely a single soul remembers them is no small reason why.
text_simple: very few mortals since have earned my respect like the korumite that barely a single soul remembers them is no small reason why

name: voidspir_fabric_01_05
text: Soon the fabric of this realm will merge with others, and the ripples of destruction will touch all planes equally.
text_simple: soon the fabric of this realm will merge with others and the ripples of destruction will touch all planes equally

name: voidspir_arcane_art_01
text: There could be no arcane art were it not for the void. While not the sole ingredient, it is certainly a vital one.
text_simple: there could be no arcane art were it not for the void while not the sole ingredient it is certainly a vital one
